# LeafProperty.Sgx.SGX2 property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SGX2. If true, Indicates Intel SGX supports the collection of SGX2 leaf functions (Subleaf 2 or higher)

Key Composition

* Leaf: Sgx
* Property: SGX2
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey SGX2 { get; }
```
